text: "The Passion of Lovers" is a 1981 song by English gothic rock band Bauhaus and is the second single from their second studio album Mask. It peaked at number 56 on the British charts. ==Track listing== #"The Passion of Lovers" #"1. David Jay 2. Peter Murphy 3. Kevin Haskins 4. Daniel Ash" Category:1981 songs Category:Bauhaus (band) songs Category:Gothic rock songs
title: The Passion of Lovers
